metadata.Title: CVE-2023-26117 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: Versions of the package angular from 1.0.0 are vulnerable to Regular Expression Denial of Service (ReDoS) via the $resource service due to the usage of an insecure regular expression. Exploiting this vulnerability is possible by a large carefully-crafted input, which can result in catastrophic backtracking.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> There is no upstream fix for this issue as of 2023-05-15

criterions.comment: angular.js: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was deferred').
